org.megatome.frame2.event.xml
Interface PassthruEvent

All Superinterfaces:
Event
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimplePassthruEvent
public interface PassthruEvent
extends Event

The PassthruEvent interface defines a simple interface for setting and getting DOM element data in an event. Events that are declared to resolve as passthru are required to implement this interface. When the event request is processed, the framework will use the set behavior to provide the body of the SOAP request. The event handlers may then use the get method to access the unprocessed body.

          Get the SOAP request body.
